data.lyric:

[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:The Voice (Deluxe) (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Kanye Krazy (Explicit) - Lil Durk
[00:00.59]Lyrics by：John Lamb/Durk Banks/Tahj Vaughn/Sterling Reynolds/Lukas Payne
[00:01.19]Composed by：John Lamb/Durk Banks/Tahj Vaughn/Sterling Reynolds/Lukas Payne
[00:01.78]Tahj Money
[00:02.84]
[00:05.84]Ayy pull up Lam
[00:06.76]
[00:22.25]I fucked up so many times would you bless me again
[00:25.07]You went through what I went through
[00:26.45]You would feel desperate to win
[00:27.83]You got statements on your dog you a threat with the pen
[00:30.80]Couple nights I wrote strike 'cause they was changing the VIN
[00:33.45]And I drink a ginger ale that's what I take with my ten
[00:36.34]I say this one last time then I'll take it again
[00:39.13]Is you with me or you not but ain't gon' say it again
[00:41.82]Get a second chance with promises don't break it again oh
[00:45.86]I'm goin' Kanye crazy Kanye crazy Kanye crazy
[00:50.83]
[00:51.57]I'm goin' Kanye crazy Kanye crazy
[00:55.29]
[00:55.83]I'm goin' Kanye crazy Kanye crazy Kanyе crazy
[01:02.25]
[01:03.35]Kanye crazy Kanye crazy goin' Kanye crazy
[01:07.56]
[01:08.41]You ain't got thе answers Sway
[01:09.56]
[01:10.12]I be claimin' I'm the realest like any other day
[01:12.20]
[01:12.76]The feds got and went in the camera inside his Cartier
[01:15.38]Tryna not to bring up s**t you did
[01:16.87]You gotta concentrate
[01:17.87]
[01:18.82]They don't be thinkin' 'bout handcuffs no more
[01:20.60]They tryna kill me
[01:21.57]I won't put my trust in you no more you gotta feel me
[01:24.30]
[01:24.94]Bringin' all my K's I had to seal it
[01:26.95]
[01:27.88]Kanye crazy but this the real me
[01:29.53]
[01:30.87]I'm goin' Kanye crazy Kanye crazy Kanye crazy
[01:35.76]
[01:36.43]I'm goin' Kanye crazy Kanye crazy
[01:40.71]I'm goin' Kanye crazy Kanye crazy Kanye crazy
[01:46.97]
[01:48.20]Kanye crazy Kanye crazy goin' Kanye crazy
data.trans:
[ti:Kanye Krazy (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:The Voice (Deluxe) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.59]//
[00:01.18]//
[00:01.78]Tahj Money制作
[00:02.84]
[00:05.84]John Lam制作
[00:06.76]
[00:22.25]我搞砸了太多次 你是否愿意再保佑我一次
[00:25.07]你经历过我所经历的痛苦以后
[00:26.45]你会迫切地渴望赢得胜利
[00:27.83]你听着你朋友的一面之词 你拿着笔来威胁我
[00:30.80]好几个夜晚 我写下金句 因为他们更换汽车号码牌 无处可寻
[00:33.45]我喝着姜汁汽水 这是我和着好货的饮料
[00:36.34]我再说最后一遍 我会卷土重来
[00:39.13]你是否愿意和我在一起 我以后再也不会说了
[00:41.82]许下承诺 得到第二次机会 不要违背你的诺言
[00:45.86]我像Kanye一样疯狂 释放自我
[00:50.83]
[00:51.57]我像Kanye一样疯狂 释放自我
[00:55.29]
[00:55.83]我像Kanye一样疯狂 释放自我
[01:02.25]
[01:03.35]像Kanye一样疯狂 释放自我
[01:07.56]
[01:08.41]你没有得到答案 Sway
[01:09.56]
[01:10.12]从始至终 我说我是最真实的人
[01:12.20]
[01:12.76]警察突然盘查 捕捉到他卡地亚墨镜下慌张的眼神
[01:15.38]尽量不要提起你干的那些坏事
[01:16.87]你必须集中注意力
[01:17.87]
[01:18.82]他们不想让我沦为阶下囚
[01:20.60]他们想杀了我
[01:21.57]我不会再相信你 你要感受我的心意
[01:24.30]
[01:24.94]带上我所有的枪 我必须把武器藏好
[01:26.95]
[01:27.88]像Kanye一样疯狂 释放自我 可这是我的本来面目
[01:29.53]
[01:30.87]我像Kanye一样疯狂 释放自我
[01:35.76]
[01:36.43]我像Kanye一样疯狂 释放自我
[01:40.71]我像Kanye一样疯狂 释放自我
[01:46.97]
[01:48.20]像Kanye一样疯狂 释放自我
